arrowParens.description: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter.

oneOf.description: Omit parens when possible. Example: `x => x`

bracketSameLine.description: Put > of opening tags on the last line instead of on a new line.

htmlWhitespaceSensitivity.description: How to handle whitespaces in HTML.

printWidth.description: The line length where Prettier will try wrap.

singleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes.
